Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class GamePanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.ActivePanel
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.GamePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GamePanel
extends ActivePanel
Panel shown to the user after god selection, it is used when the players place their workers and remains active until the game ends. It contains a BoardPanel
See Also:
